attributes.title: Grave Robber Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Jack shows us where to find the 13 hidden death cards in COD:WaW needed to unlock the Grave Robber Achievement.

attributes.title: The Professional Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Jack shows us how to get "The Professional" in COD:WaW.

attributes.title: Mercenaries 2 Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Community member Blazeofmerc shows us how to get the first two achievements in Mercenaries 2.

attributes.title: Workhorse Achievement
attributes.description: Community member "Thoric" shows us how to get the Workhorse Achievement in Fable II

attributes.title: Community Video: Head for Heights Guide
attributes.description: Gingerlink shows us how to get the "Head for Heights" Achievement in Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts and Bolts.

attributes.title: The Professional and Gunslinger Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Community member "Frank_West" shows us how to get the Professional, and Gunslinger Achievements in Call of Duty: World at War.

attributes.title: Melee is Best, Deer Trainer, The Traitor Guide
attributes.description: Community member "milesprower" shows us how to get the Melee is Best, Deer Trainer, and The Traitor Achievements in Castle Crashers.

attributes.title: First Four Achievements
attributes.description: Jack shows us how to get: Gender Bender, Skater Evolved, I Like to Move it, and Meet Slappy in the upcoming EA game Skate 2 (coming out Jan 21, 2009).

attributes.title: Iron Fist Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Jack gets the tank-based achievement "Iron Fist" in Call of Duty: World at War

attributes.title: The Gunslinger Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Jack gets the sniper-mission based achievement "The Gunslinger."

attributes.title: Six Achievements
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get: Cherry Picker, Bombs Away, Flushed Away, Landlubber, Cartographer, and Boom Boom in Age of Booty.

attributes.title: Body Armor Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Adam shows us how to get the Body Armor Achievement in Crackdown.

attributes.title: Crackdown: Shot Putter, Body Juggler Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Adam shows us how to get two Achievements in Crackdown: Shot Putter and Body Juggler.

attributes.title: Achievement Hunt: Prince of Persia: Death of a Warrior King
attributes.description: NewfieKeir shows us how to get "Death of a Warrior King"

attributes.title: Fallout 3: Mercenary, Protector, Reaver Guide
attributes.description: Adam shows us how to nab the good, neutral, and evil Achievements in Fallout 3, all in one playthrough.

attributes.title: Lost Planet: Tornado and Volcano Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Milesprower shows us how to get the TORNADO and VOLCANO Achievements in Lost Planet.

attributes.title: Call of Duty 4: Your Show Sucks Guide
attributes.description: Kaisonic shows us how to get the "Your show sucks" Achievement in COD4.

attributes.title: Lost Planet: RAINBOW and BLIZZARD Explorer Achievements
attributes.description: Community video, 4th in a series of 5, covering target mark locations in levels 9 ad 10.

attributes.title: Pajamachievement Preview #3
attributes.description: This time the gals take on Soul Calibur IV, Monopoly and NFL Tour. It's a Super Bowl party, minus the Super Bowl!

attributes.title: Five Mythic Achievements
attributes.description: Adam gives us tips to get the following Achievements in the Halo Mythic Maps: Hammer Time, Tank Dropper, Double Double, Get the Horns, and Killtacular.

attributes.title: Tank Dropper Achievement
attributes.description: Gav and Geoff hold hand, sing songs, and show the world the most creative ways to get the "Tank Dropper" Achievement.

attributes.title: Sweet Naptime Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the "Sweet Naptime" Achievement, as well as the hidden skull and black box on level nine of Halo Wars.

attributes.title: The Procrastinator Achievement Guide
attributes.description: HooBoy, Geoff shows us how to get the Procrastinator Achievement, while also getting the 10th Hidden Skull and 10th Black Box in Halo Wars.

attributes.title: Battened Down the Hatches Guide
attributes.description: Geoff (that's me) shows us how to get the "Battened Down the Hatches" Achievement, in addition to the Hidden Skull and Black Box on level 11 of Halo Wars.

attributes.title: Untouchable Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Gavin fail miserably while trying to get the Untouchable Achievement in Watchmen: The End is Nigh.

attributes.title: Handy With Tools Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get the "Handy With Tools" Achievement, as well as the hidden skull and black box on level 12 of Halo Wars.

attributes.title: Tank Dropper Achievement
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us another way to get the Tank Dropper Achievement in Halo 3: Mythic.

attributes.title: Beaming With Pride Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get the "Beaming With Pride" Achievement, in addition to the hidden skull and black box on level 13 of Halo Wars. Special foley work by Burnie Burns.

attributes.title: Thinkin About My Doorbell Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the "Thinkin About My Doorbell" Achievement, as well as the game's final skull and black box.

attributes.title: My Horse and Me 2: Two Achievements
attributes.description: Master of Race with Katelyn and "Grooming Expert" achievement guide.

attributes.title: Awww, Too Bad Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Knuckles shows how to suck and still get Achievements in Halo 3.

attributes.title: Mill Worker (0-21) Achievement Walkthrough
attributes.description: Adam locates, activates, and verbiates the first 21 Ingots of Fallout 3's The Pitt achievement Mill Worker.

attributes.title: Mill Worker (21-43) Achievement Walkthrough
attributes.description: Adam continues the search for 100 Steel Ingots in Fallout 3's Mill Worker Achievement from The Pitt DLC.

attributes.title: Killer Achievements
attributes.description: A gruesome compilation of some of the achievements involving offing mobsters. The achievements are: 25 Massacred, 100 Whacked, Contract Killer, Full of Lead, and 250 Iced

attributes.title: Mill Worker (43-68) Achievement Walkthrough
attributes.description: Adam hits the motherlode and delivers another 24 Steel Ingots in Fallout 3's Mill Worker achievement from The Pitt DLC.

attributes.title: Family Tree Achievements
attributes.description: A walkthrough of the achievements in Godfather 2 related to the family tree. Included in this video are Right Hand Man, Second in Command and This Thing of Ours

attributes.title: Fallout 3 Mill Worker (68-80) Achievement Walkthrough
attributes.description: Adam rambles incoherently about some more Steel Ingots in the 4th of 5 guides for the Fallout 3 achievement Mill Worker.

attributes.title: Fallout 3 Mill Worker (80-100) Achievement Walkthrough
attributes.description: Adam obtains the final 20 Steel Ingots and finishes off Fallout 3's Mill Worker Achievement from The Pitt DLC.

attributes.title: Halo 3: 5 more Mythic Achievements
attributes.description: Knuckles nabs a slew of Mythic Achievements.

attributes.title: 11 Achievements
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to rake in the Gamerscore by getting 11 Ninja Blade Achievements in about 15 minutes.

attributes.title: Halo Wars - 2 Achievements
attributes.description: Achievement guide for "Penny Pincher" & "Big Al's Scooter ".

attributes.title: Be the Knife, Fireworks, Baptism by Fire Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get: Be the Knife, Fireworks, and Baptism by Fire in Resident Evil 5.

attributes.title: Three level specific Achievements
attributes.description: Gingerlink with another Banjo Kazooie achievement guide for three of the level specific achievements. Masive Damage, Test your Strength and Great Balls of Fire.

attributes.title: Lead Aspirin, Go Into the Light, Drive By, Egg On Your Face Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get: Lead Aspirin (level 3-2), Go Into the Light (level 4-1), Drive By (level 2-3), and Egg On Your Face (1-2) in Resident Evil 5.

attributes.title: Head Cheese, Meat Your Maker, Feeling Punchy, Draw Guide
attributes.description: WildRile shows us how to get: Head Cheese, Meat Your Maker, Feeling Punchy, and Draw in Eat Lead: The Return of Matt Hazard.

attributes.title: Bad Blood, Heart Stopper, Masters of Removal Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get Bad Blood, Heart Stopper, and Masters of Removal in Resident Evil 5.

attributes.title: Hannah Montana: 5 Achievements
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us the first 300 Gamerscore in a game so bad, no wonder 95% of the video is in fast forward.

attributes.title: Found!, WoW!, The Cake Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get: Found!, WoW!, and The Cake in Wolverine.

attributes.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine - Stick Around, Threading the Needle Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get the "Sticking Around" and "Threading the Needle" Achievements in X-Men Origins: Wolverine.

attributes.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine - Ultimate Wolverine Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us an easy way to get the Ultimate Wolverine Achievement, which requires you to fight four Wendigos at once... fight and win no less.

attributes.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine - Clean up on all aisles Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get the "Clean up on all aisles" Achievement in X-Men Origins: Wolverine.

attributes.title: The First Thread, Evolutionary Step, and Crossing the T Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to get: The First Thread, Evolutionary Step, and Crossing the T in Prototype on the Xbox 360.

attributes.title: Speed Bumps Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows the fastest and easiest way to get the Speed Bumps Achievement in Prototype on the Xbox 360.

attributes.title: Polymath Achievement Guide Part One
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to find the first 14 hidden "hint" collectibles in Prototype. And yes, he realizes he calls it the wrong Achievement in the video and is an idiot.

attributes.title: Polymath Achievement Guide Part Two
attributes.description: Geoff shows us how to find hidden "hint" collectibles 15-27 in Prototype.

attributes.title: Level One Guide w/ artifacts, fountains, scans
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get "You gotta try that pole" "And you want me to keep it", "Total Protonic Reversal", "Kosher", and all of the hidden artifacts, water fountains and scans for: Back off Man. I'm a Scientist, Ghostbusters Drinking Game, and Spores, Molds, and Fungus.

attributes.title: Level Three Guide w/ artifacts, fountains, scans
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get all of the hidden artifacts, water fountains and scans for: Back off Man. I'm a Scientist, Ghostbusters Drinking Game, and Spores, Molds, and Fungus on level three: Public Library. As a bonus, he also shows us how to get the Slam Dunk Achievement.

attributes.title: But the Kids Love Us! Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the "But the Kids Love Us!" Achievement Guide in Ghostbusters: The Video Game.

attributes.title: Level Four Guide w/ artifacts, fountains, scans
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get all of the hidden artifacts, water fountains and scans for: Back off Man. I'm a Scientist, Ghostbusters Drinking Game, and Spores, Molds, and Fungus on level four: History Museum. As a bonus, he also shows us how to get the Slam Dunk Achievement.

attributes.title: Level 5 Guide w/ artifacts, fountains, scans
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get all of the hidden artifacts, water fountains and scans for: Back off Man. I'm a Scientist, Ghostbusters Drinking Game, and Spores, Molds, and Fungus on level five.

attributes.title: Level Six Guide w/ artifacts, scans
attributes.description: Geoff shows where to find the hidden artifacts and ghost scans for level six of Ghostbusters: The Video Game.

attributes.title: Hedgebuster Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the Hedgebuster Achievement on Level Six of Ghostbusters.

attributes.title: One down, on the Ground! Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the One Down, On the Ground! Achievement in the Central Park Cemetery Level of Ghostbusters.

attributes.title: Level Seven Guide w/ artifacts, scans
attributes.description: Geoff shows where to find the hidden artifacts and ghost scans for level seven of Ghostbusters: The Video Game.

attributes.title: Achievement Overview
attributes.description: Geoff gives a poorly thought out and rambling overview of the 12 Achievements in Battlefield: 1943.

attributes.title: Riddler Trophy Guide Part One
attributes.description: ChurchesWife brings you part one of her Riddler Trophy guide. And a few achievements to appease you rabid fanboys.)

attributes.title: Riddler Trophy Guide Part Two
attributes.description: Church'sWife is back with Part Two of her Riddler Trophy Guide. This gripping episode also shows how to get Arkham Analyst, Born Free, and Cryptic Investigator.

attributes.title: Nine Achievements
attributes.description: BrownMan is back showing you how to get 9 more achievements in Madden NFL 10, including: Why Can't We Be Friends, Super Bowl MVP-like, Fight For the Fumble, Look What I Found, Nano, From Me to You, Frozen Tundra, and Sprint 2 Minute Drill.

attributes.title: Two Boss Fight DLC Achievements
attributes.description: Adam shows us the two boss fight achievements (And the Quarterback is Toast and No More Lies, Old Man) from the new Tatooine Star Wars: The Force Unleashed DLC.

attributes.title: Mission Accomplished Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get a very easy, and very easy to miss Achievement in MUA2.

attributes.title: Collectibles Guide Part One: Prologue
attributes.description: Geoff shows us where to find the hidden collectibles in the prologue level of MUA2. This video works toward getting: Above and Beyond, Listening In, and Superior Intel.

attributes.title: Tactical Training Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the easy-to-miss "Tactical Training" Achievement in Marvel Ultimate Alliance 2.

attributes.title: Act 1, Day 1 Collectible Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows where to find the hidden collectibles in Act One, Day One in Marvel Ultimate Alliance 2.

attributes.title: Wraith Killer Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows a few tips and tricks for getting the "Wraith Killer" Achievement in the Uplift Reserve level of Halo 3: ODST.

attributes.title: Both Tubes Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff is clever. He knows how to get the Both Tubes Achievement in ODST. Be clever like Geoff.

attributes.title: Laser Blaster Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Gavin shows the easiest way to get 10 Spartan Laser kills on ONI Alpha Site.

attributes.title: Dome Inspector Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Gavin shows us how to get the Dome Inspector Achievement in Halo 3: ODST. Very useful additional help provided by Burnie

attributes.title: I Like Fire Achievement Guide
attributes.description: I Like Fire and so does Gavin, at least that's what he told me when he was getting this Achievement in ODST.

attributes.title: Pink and Deadly Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff, being both pink and deadly himself, shows us how to get the Pink and Deadly Achievement in Halo 3: ODST

attributes.title: Vidmaster Challenge: Classic Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows one way to get the seemingly difficult "Vidmaster Challenge: Classic" Achievement in ODST.

attributes.title: Crash Course DLC: Tank Stumble Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Andrew show you a quick and easy way to get the "Tank Stumble" Achievement in Crash Course

attributes.title: Crash Course DLC: Quick Power Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Andrew show you how to get Quick Power and Crash Course in the new L4D dlc, nabbing you 40 Gamerscore.

attributes.title: Stunning! Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Gavin shows how to not "get", and then later "get" the Stunning! Achievement in Halo 3: ODST.

attributes.title: Riddler Trophy Guide Part Three
attributes.description: ChurchsWife is back with Part Three of her Riddler Trophy Guide. This gripping episode also shows how to get Just What the Doctors Ordered, Daydreamer, and Baneful Payback.

attributes.title: Flowerslave Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show how to get the Flowerslave Achievement in Brutal Legend.

attributes.title: King of the Hill Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get 35 gamerscore in about 5 minutes via the King of the Hill and Give Yer Hands a Rest Achievements.

attributes.title: Azazel Guide / Night at the Movies
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to beat the final boss in arena mode with basically just one button, thus nabbing the "Night at the Movies" Achievement.

attributes.title: The Ballad of Gay Tony - Catch the Bus Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the very confusing "Catch the Bus" Achievement in GTAIV The Ballad of Gay Tony.

attributes.title: Four Play Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff show show to get the Four Play Achievement in The Ballad of Gay Tony.

attributes.title: Bear Fight Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the Bear Fight Achievement in The Ballad of Gay Tony.

attributes.title: Adrenaline Junkie Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the Adrenaline Junkie Achievement in The Ballad of Gay Tony.

attributes.title: Bloody Achievements
attributes.description: Jack shows you how to pick up three blood-related achievements in Fairytale Fights while Geoff complains about the font.

attributes.title: Power Level Guide
attributes.description: Gus shows you how to power level your character so you can hit level 20 very early in the game.

attributes.title: Demon and Lapper Guide
attributes.description: Community member Darthmeow shows how to get the Demon and Lapper Achievements in Forza Motorsport 3.

attributes.title: Driving High Guide
attributes.description: Milesprower shows us how to get the "driving high" achievement in Crackdown.

attributes.title: Ghost Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the "Ghost" Achievement in the second level of Modern Warfare 2 - Cliffhanger.

attributes.title: Three-some Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show how to get the Three-some Achievement in Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Ten Plus Foot-Mobiles Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the "Ten Plus Foot-Mobiles" Achievement in Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: The Harder They Fall Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you two places to get the "The Harder They Fall" Achievement in Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: No Rest for the Wary Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get the "No Rest for the Wary" Achievement in the Cliffhanger level of Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Some Like it Hot Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to fail your way to the Some Like it Hot Achievement in Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Unnecessary Roughness Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get an easy Achievement in an easy way.

attributes.title: Knock-knock Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows an easy place to get the Knock-knock Achievement.

attributes.title: Dragon Age Origins: Pilgrim and Tinkerer Achievements
attributes.description: Gus shows you how to get the Pilgrim and Tinkerer achievements in Dragon Age Origins. Honestly, if you needed a guide for these maybe gaming isn't for you.

attributes.title: Drive-By Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get the Drive By Achievement on the level "endgame" in Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Look Ma Two Hands Guide
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get the "Look Ma Two Hands" Achievement in Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Stache Whacker Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Andrew show you how and where to get the Stache Whacker Achievement in L4D2's Dark Carnival level.

attributes.title: Gong Show Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get the Gong Show Achievement in Left 4 Dead 2's Dark Carnival.

attributes.title: Septic Tank, Head Honcho Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get two quick and easy Achievements in Left 4 Dead 2.

attributes.title: Bridge Over Trebled Slaughter Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get the Bridge Over Trebled Slaughter Achievement in L4D2.

attributes.title: Wing and a Prayer Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows you how to get the Wing and a Prayer Achievement in Left 4 Dead 2.

attributes.title: Tank Burger Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows the quickest way to get the Tank Burger Achievement in Left 4 Dead 2.

attributes.title: Violence in Silence Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the Violence in Silence Achievement in L4D2.

attributes.title: Sob Story Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the Sob Story Achievement in L4D2.

attributes.title: Pea Shooter Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows how to get the Pea Shooter Achievement in Call of Duty: Classic, for XBL Arcade.

attributes.title: Beat the Rush Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff, Jeff, and Andrew show and easy way to get the "Beat the Rush" Achievement in Left 4 Dead 2.

attributes.title: Shock Jock Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jeff and Andrew show how to get the Shock Jock Achievement quickly in Left 4 Dead 2.

attributes.title: Gunslinger Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Gunslinger Achievement on the Pathfinder map in the Xbox Live Arcade game, Call of Duty Classic.

attributes.title: The Quick and the Dead Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easy way to get the "Quick and the Dead" Achievement in Left 4 Dead 2.

attributes.title: You Choose the Wrong Friends Guide
attributes.description: Burnie and special guest JD (Burnie's 7 year old son) show you how to pick up the "You Choose the Wrong Friends." achievement in Lego Indiana Jones 2.

attributes.title: Master of Disguise, No Witness Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show to get the No Witnesses and Master of Disguise Achievements in The Saboteur.

attributes.title: Eiffel Tower Achievements
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack pick up a couple of achievements around the Eiffel Tower in Saboteur. They grab Top o' The World and then High Diver. Magnifique!

attributes.title: Quick Contraband Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows a quick way to earn some extra contraband in The Saboteur.

attributes.title: Iknimaya Clean Sweep Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff give some tips for getting the Iknimaya Clean Sweep Achievement in Avatar.

attributes.title: Burning Sensation Achievement Guide
attributes.description: Geoff shows a quick and easy way to get the Burning Sensation Achievement in Left 4 Dead 2.

attributes.title: Serious Complex Guide
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Serious Complex Achievement in Shadow Complex.
